description: Through a sequence of projects, architectural design students learn about drawing (hand drafting and computer-aided drawing and design) and architectural design processes that require the integration of social, artistic, technical and environmental issues. Prerequisites: Art 111 and 112 (or 110). Materials fee. Offered alternate years.
name: Arch Drawing/Design I
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Art 111 and 112 (or 110). Materials fee. Offered alternate years.
title: Architectural Drawing and Design I
